introduction: 两个来自不同文化和性取向的人物之间不可能的友谊。来自印度的年轻直男Sunny在纽约遇到了中年同性恋者Larry。他们对电影、演艺、生活有着共同的热爱，对彼此有着深厚的感情。但是，当一些东西丢失，责任归于少数派的时候，这段真正的友谊会怎么样呢？他们都是故事中的少数派，但一个要道歉，一个要原谅。An unlikely friendship between two characters from different cultures and sexuality. Sunny, a young straight guy from India meets Larry, a middle-aged gay guy in New York. They share a love of film, acting, life, and deep affection towards each other. But what happens to that true friendship when something goes missing and the blame goes to the minority? They both are the minority in the story but one has to apologies and the other has to forgive.@爱看电影的浩浩
